url.description: URL for file upload. To upload file, Http PUT request with header 'x-ms-blob-type' : 'BlockBlob' can be issued. File has to be g-zipped

file_type.description:
Type of the file uploaded.
            #Valid values:
            * MerchantSKUs
            * MerchantSKUsOffer
            * Inventory
            * Price
            * Relationship
            * Archive
            * ShippingException
            * ReturnsException
            * Variation
